name: Racing Island
description:
Inspired by classic top-down racers (Super Cars II, Super Sprint, Micro Machines and Death Rally to name a few) Roadclub is our evolution of this retro racer genre.

Features

  • Fight to get promoted to higher divisions
  • Feel the road like never before in a 2D racer
  • Manage the personality of the cars
  • Master the tracks and set records
  • Create your own leagues, tracks, cars and opponents
  • Rock to the amazing soundtrack featuring music by Zircon

Development status Roadclub is currently in a early access alpha state. It does not contain all content of the final game but game code is close to beta and the game should run well. This version is pay-what-you-want to support further development. Minimum price will increase as we add more content so be sure to try it now!

IMPORTANT NOTE: Please be aware that changes to the game may need records and profiles to be wiped prior to final release.

This version includes:

  • Custom event mode where you can create your race
  • Rookie, Pro and Elite difficulties
  • 5 cars
  • 3 tracks
  • 54 club members

The full game will also have:

  • League career mode
  • Local splitscreen racing
  • More cars
  • More tracks
  • More music
  • More difficulties
  • and more..

Do you like the game? Please show your support by sending us feedback, sharing the game with your friends. Please consider buying Roadclub for the suggested price or less if you like it. It will make it possible for us to complete Roadclub and make it the best damn retro racer ever (BDRRE)!
